attributes.action: Allow the provision of fast trains for Deal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown,

You should allow Southeastern Railways to provide Deal in Kent with fast trains.

We have been shamefully left out of the high speed network that has recently opened in Kent.

The rolling stock shoots through our station at 70 mph on route from the depot to the present starting point of the new service in Dover.

It would cost nothing to stop the trains at Deal station and Southeastern Railways says it would like to run a service to Deal because it would be profitable for them - yet your government won’t let them.

This is an administrative mess on the part of your government which you can put right at no significant cost.
